content: There are four levels of AI marketing mastery.
Kristin Fracchia, Head of Marketing at Gamma, has architected an end-to-end AI-powered marketing system that contributed to Gamma reaching a $2.1B valuation and over $100M in annual revenue.
To advance AI marketing mastery, move beyond basic prompting to use AI as a partner for brainstorming, diagnosing significant problems, and automating entire campaigns.
Identify your current AI level and leverage advanced tools like Claude Skills and AI agents to scale up marketing efforts while avoiding common mistakes.
